Game information:


Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - a re-interpretation of the mythology of
the series Castlevania The epic is set in a dark time when the bond of
peace and heaven threaten evil and powerful forces - Lords of Shadow
Souls of the dead roam the earth shattered, unable to find peace, and
evil creatures wreaked devastation, chaos and death among the living

And then there is you - Gabriel Belmont, a member of the Brotherhood
of Light - an elite group of holy knights who protect the innocent
against the supernatural Beloved Gabriel was brutay murdered by the
evil, and her soul forever remains trapped between the worlds of the
dead and the living Seeing the terrible truth that awaits mankind,
she gave the conductor Gabriel to his destiny and salvation of the world

The game includes HD graphics, a released at the moment additions
(Reverie and Resurrection), an updated storyline, in which there wi be
both old and new characters Also in Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Ultimate
Edition users wi experience previously unseen bosses and enemies and try to
master the powerful weapons - Combat Cross


Game Features:
 


new chapter legendary Castlevania series has found a new form thanks to the
studio Mercury Steam Gorgeous graphics, addictive gameplay and an intriguing
storyline wi please both novices and fans of the original game

star cast development of the game in taking part Hideo Kojima - the creator
of the iconic Metal Gear Roles voiced famous actors: Robert Carlyle (Robert Carlyle),
Patrick Stewart (Patrick Stewart), Jason Isaacs (Jason Isaacs) and Natasha Makelhon
(Natascha McElhone) of the Holy Cross In the battle with the darkspawn Gabriel uses
a special Battle Cross - a unique multi-functional weapon, capable of turning into
a silver stake and whip Also, vampire hunter arsenal includes four decades of fighting combos

Abroad darkness Explore the vast and varied world of games, battle terrifying monsters
and their minions Gabriel path wi pass through 50 fuy three-dimensional game zones,
where it wi not withstand more than 45 types of enemies



RePack Features:
 

Do not cut / no recoded
Additional content (Ultimate Edition):
Installation time ~ 35 min

Additions:  

Resurrection

Game information:


The first part of the saga of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow revealed the secret
of the Belmont Clan In the continuation of the history you face new chaenges
and unexpected plot twists At the end of grand saga Dracula returns - weakened
and eager to get rid of the shackles of immortality However, a new threat wi
make a great vampire look for ways to recover their strength The key to this -
in his own castle But do not hurry to write off the Belmont clan


Game Features:
 


sequel of the famous game created in 2010 in close cooperation with the fans Get
ready for an exciting new stories and new encounters with a variety of opponents

Events Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 starts immediately after the finale of the
first part - in the modern world, where the weakened Dracula seeks to get rid of
his immortality His longtime associate Sobek offers vampire to battle with Satan,
who has returned to the world to make a doomsday

World Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 has changed beyond recognition You are waiting
for a huge area that you can learn as much as you want, gloomy city in the Gothic
style, and countless enemies - powerful minions of Satan

Travel the open world, returning to previously explored places after the acquisition
of new skis Brand new mobile camera wi aow you to explore a corners of the world and
to fuy enjoy the inimitable visual style Castlevania

Key elements of the combat system underwent a thorough revision A variety of weapons
has its own unique features - for example, by Void Sword you can stretch the life of
the wounded opponents, and Chaos Claw pierce any defense Besides Dracula becomes
stronger through the blood of his enemies Properly aocating resources, you will be
able to develop their abilities



RePack Features:
 


Do not cut / no recoded


Additions:


Armored Dracula Costume
Dark Dracula Costume
Relic Rune Pack
Revelations

Instaation time ~ 20 min

The game Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate HD you wi find familiar
from previous games Castlevania series action, but this time wi be added to the
platform gameplay and 3D-graphics Players wi explore the castle Dracula and its
surrounding area; find relics that wi help improve your ability; battle with
horrible monsters Tricky puzzles, devious traps, meetings with the nightmarish
bosses - a this you have to go to defeat Dracula himself!
